product.name: 크래프톤 배틀그라운드 대회 (PWS)
product.description: The official PUBG battle royale tournament for both professionals and amateurs to prove their skills.
product.key_benefit: Amateurs can participate and win with the right team roles and routine.

characters.name: 게이머

appearance.face: Young Asian male with neutral expression, clean-shaven, oval face shape
appearance.distinguishing_feature: WEARING LARGE GAMING HEADSET WITH MICROPHONE on head

characters.clothing: Black long-sleeve shirt, dark blue pants, black sneakers, fingerless gaming gloves
characters.voice: Energetic and emotional, easily panicked but determined, speaks casual Korean
characters.speaking_visual: mouth opens wide and speaks expressively

characters.name: GPT

appearance.face: Simple cute face with two round black eyes on cube-shaped head
appearance.body_type: Small mint-green humanoid robot with cube body, stubby arms and legs
appearance.skin_tone: Mint green with soft matte texture
appearance.distinguishing_feature: MINT-GREEN CUBE ROBOT with WHITE CHATGPT LOGO on chest and TWO ROUND BLACK EYES

characters.voice: Calm, robotic, speaks in formal Korean ending with ~합니다
characters.speaking_visual: entire body BOUNCES up and down rhythmically, eyes BLINK rapidly

scene_setting.location: Dark gaming room with glowing monitor, gaming chair, keyboard and mouse on desk.
scene_setting.lighting: Strong blue-white light from monitor only, creating silhouette effect.

camera_setup.texture: realistic skin texture, glowing monitor light

mood_style.genre: Frustration to surreal sci-fi portal transition
mood_style.color_tone: Dark room with intense blue-white monitor glow

audio.background: Game over sound, then digital surge
audio.fx: Keyboard typing, frustrated sigh, digital whoosh and electrical crackling

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Medium shot from behind, focused on silhouette and monitor
timeline.visual_description: A young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET and black long-sleeve shirt sits in a gaming chair facing a glowing monitor showing a game over screen. He slams the desk in frustration, his MOUTH OPENS WIDE TO SPEAK angrily. The room is dark except for the bright blue-white screen light.
timeline.dialogue: 아! 또 죽었어 에임 연습안되니까 죽잖아!

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Medium shot from side, showing gamer typing
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET types furiously on keyboard, his MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with determination. The monitor glows brightly in the dark room.
timeline.dialogue: 아 도저히 못참겠다 챗지피티한테 커스텀 훈련장 만들어달라 해야지

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.camera: Medium shot showing monitor with robot appearing
timeline.movement: accelerating push toward monitor as vortex appears
timeline.visual_description: On the monitor, a mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo appears and BOUNCES as it SPEAKS. Suddenly a swirling vortex of light bursts from the screen. The gamer's eyes go wide in shock, MOUTH CLOSED, as he is violently pulled toward the monitor, his body stretching as he gets sucked into the digital world.

scene_setting.location: Post-apocalyptic urban street. Abandoned concrete buildings, broken windows, debris on streets, overcast sky.
scene_setting.lighting: Overcast daylight, grey sky, diffused shadows.

camera_setup.texture: gritty urban decay, realistic character detail

audio.background: Distant gunfire transitioning to upbeat training music
audio.fx: Footsteps, gunfire, reload sounds, shell casings

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: In the middle of a destroyed urban street, a young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET and black long-sleeve shirt is PANICKING. He looks around frantically, arms flailing, his MOUTH WIDE OPEN SHOUTING. The mint-green cube robot stands beside him, completely STILL and SILENT.
timeline.dialogue: 으아 아니 진짜 게임속으로 들어가면 어떻게 하냐고!

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES up and down as it SPEAKS calmly, round black eyes BLINKING. The gamer stands frozen in background, MOUTH SHUT, listening.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Over shoulder tracking shot, showing targets ahead
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET crouches behind cover, holding a rifle. He pops up, aims, and fires controlled bursts at enemies. Each shot hits. He moves tactically between positions, face showing growing confidence. His MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with realization. The mint-green cube robot watches from behind, completely STILL.
timeline.dialogue: 맨날 벽만 쏘다가, 진짜 실전 같이 쏘니까 실력이 느는 것 같은데?

timeline.speaker: B
timeline.camera: Side shot with robot in focus, gamer in background
timeline.visual_description: The mint-green cube robot with ChatGPT logo BOUNCES up and down as it SPEAKS, raising one stubby arm in warning gesture. Its round black eyes BLINK. Behind it, the young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET continues moving tactically but keeps his MOUTH TIGHTLY SHUT, listening.

scene_setting.location: Open urban street with long sight lines, behind concrete barrier for cover.

camera_setup.texture: sharp detail on facial reaction, sweat, tension

mood_style.color_tone: High contrast, harsh whites and deep shadows

audio.background: Sudden silence, then tense sustained note, heartbeat
audio.fx: Sniper shot crack, bullet whiz, heavy breathing

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Wide shot then quick zoom to close-up on shocked face
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET stands in an open street. A bullet suddenly whizzes past, hitting the ground near his feet. He flinches violently, eyes wide with terror, and his MOUTH OPENS WIDE TO SCREAM as he dives desperately toward a concrete barrier for cover.

timeline.speaker: None
timeline.visual_description: Close-up on the young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET crouched behind a concrete barrier. He breathes heavily, MOUTH SLIGHTLY OPEN but SILENT, sweat on his forehead. He peeks out cautiously to assess where the sniper is. His expression slowly shifts from fear to determination as he weighs his options - counter-snipe or stay down? The decision hangs in the air.
